Bash(python3 -c "
import paramiko
import time

client = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
client.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)

print\(''Connecting to 137.184.232.25...''\)
try:
    client.connect\(''137.184.232.25'', username=''root'', password=''1f88-0e96-9526-bce3'', timeout=15, banner_timeout=15\)
    print\(''Connected successfully!''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Connection error: {e}''\)
    exit\(1\)

def run_cmd\(cmd, label\):
    print\(f''\\n=== {label} ===''\)
    print\(f''Command: {cmd}''\)
    try:
        stdin, stdout, stderr = client.exec_command\(cmd, timeout=10\)
        out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''replace''\).strip\(\)
        err = stderr.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''replace''\).strip\(\)
        if out:
            print\(''STDOUT:'', out\)
        if err:
            print\(''STDERR:'', err\)
        if not out and not err:
            print\(''\(no output\)''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''Error running command: {e}''\)

run_cmd\(''cat /etc/os-release'', ''1. OS Version''\)
run_cmd\(''free -h'', ''2. Memory''\)
run_cmd\(''df -h'', ''3. Disk Space''\)
run_cmd\(''nproc'', ''4. CPU Info''\)
run_cmd\(''docker --version'', ''5. Docker''\)
run_cmd\(''node --version'', ''6. Node.js''\)
run_cmd\(''python3 --version'', ''7. Python3''\)
run_cmd\(''nginx -v'', ''8. Nginx''\)
run_cmd\(''ss -tlnp'', ''9. Listening Ports''\)
run_cmd\(''ls -la /root/'', ''10a. /root/ contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls -la /opt/'', ''10b. /opt/ contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls -la /mnt/'', ''11. /mnt/ contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls /mnt/root/ 2>/dev/null || echo ""no /mnt/root""'', ''11b. /mnt/root contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls /mnt/data/ 2>/dev/null || echo ""no /mnt/data""'', ''11c. /mnt/data contents''\)

client.close\(\)
print\(''\\n=== Done ===''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import paramiko
import time

client = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
client.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)

print\(''Connecting to 137.184.232.25...''\)
try:
    client.connect\(''137.184.232.25'', username=''root'', password=''1f88-0e96-9526-bce3'', timeout=15, banner_timeout=15\)
    print\(''Connected successfully!''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Connection error: {e}''\)
    exit\(1\)

def run_cmd\(cmd, label\):
    print\(f''\\n=== {label} ===''\)
    print\(f''Command: {cmd}''\)
    try:
        stdin, stdout, stderr = client.exec_command\(cmd, timeout=10\)
        out = stdout.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''replace''\).strip\(\)
        err = stderr.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8'', errors=''replace''\).strip\(\)
        if out:
            print\(''STDOUT:'', out\)
        if err:
            print\(''STDERR:'', err\)
        if not out and not err:
            print\(''\(no output\)''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''Error running command: {e}''\)

run_cmd\(''cat /etc/os-release'', ''1. OS Version''\)
run_cmd\(''free -h'', ''2. Memory''\)
run_cmd\(''df -h'', ''3. Disk Space''\)
run_cmd\(''nproc'', ''4. CPU Info''\)
run_cmd\(''docker --version'', ''5. Docker''\)
run_cmd\(''node --version'', ''6. Node.js''\)
run_cmd\(''python3 --version'', ''7. Python3''\)
run_cmd\(''nginx -v'', ''8. Nginx''\)
run_cmd\(''ss -tlnp'', ''9. Listening Ports''\)
run_cmd\(''ls -la /root/'', ''10a. /root/ contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls -la /opt/'', ''10b. /opt/ contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls -la /mnt/'', ''11. /mnt/ contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls /mnt/root/ 2>/dev/null || echo ""no /mnt/root""'', ''11b. /mnt/root contents''\)
run_cmd\(''ls /mnt/data/ 2>/dev/null || echo ""no /mnt/data""'', ''11c. /mnt/data contents''\)

client.close\(\)
print\(''\\nDone.''\)
")
